member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Configuration.CrowdStrikeOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for connecting to the CrowdStrike Falcon API.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Configuration.CrowdStrikeOptions.BaseUrl
member.summary: The base URL of the CrowdStrike Falcon API.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Configuration.CrowdStrikeOptions.ClientId
member.summary: The client ID used for OAuth2 authentication.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Configuration.CrowdStrikeOptions.ClientSecret
member.summary: The client secret used for OAuth2 authentication.

member.name: M:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Configuration.CrowdStrikeOptions.Validate
member.summary: Validates that required configuration fields are set correctly. Throws ArgumentException if any are missing or malformed.

member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.CrowdStrikeTokenResponse
member.summary: Represents the response payload returned by the CrowdStrike Falcon token endpoint. Includes bearer token and expiration metadata. Values may be missing in case of API drift or error.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.CrowdStrikeTokenResponse.AccessToken
member.summary: The bearer token used for subsequent Falcon API requests.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.CrowdStrikeTokenResponse.ExpiresIn
member.summary: The duration in seconds until the token expires. May be zero or omitted in edge cases. Consumers should apply a fallback if this value is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail
member.summary: Represents detailed device information returned by the CrowdStrike Falcon API.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.DeviceId
member.summary: The unique device identifier assigned by Falcon.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.Cid
member.summary: The CrowdStrike customer identifier (CID) for the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.Hostname
member.summary: The hostname of the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.ProductName
member.summary: The operating system product name installed on the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.OSVersion
member.summary: The version of the operating system running on the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.OSBuild
member.summary: The build number of the operating system.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.KernelVersion
member.summary: The kernel version of the operating system.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.PlatformName
member.summary: The name of the device platform (e.g., Windows, Mac, Linux).

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.PlatformVersion
member.summary: The version of the device platform.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.AgentVersion
member.summary: The version of the Falcon agent installed on the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.AgentLocalTime
member.summary: The local time reported by the Falcon agent on the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.ProductType
member.summary: The product type code of the operating system.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.ProductTypeDesc
member.summary: The description of the product type.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.GroupName
member.summary: The list of Falcon groups to which the device belongs.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.FirstSeen
member.summary: The timestamp when the device was first seen by Falcon.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.LastSeen
member.summary: The timestamp when the device was last seen by Falcon.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.LastLoginUser
member.summary: The username of the last user to log in to the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.LastLoginUserSid
member.summary: The security identifier (SID) of the last login user.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.LastLoginTimestamp
member.summary: The timestamp of the last login event on the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.LastReboot
member.summary: The timestamp of the last reboot of the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.SerialNumber
member.summary: The serial number of the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.Status
member.summary: The current status of the device in Falcon.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.ProvisionStatus
member.summary: The provisioning status of the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.BiosVersion
member.summary: The BIOS version of the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.BiosManufacturer
member.summary: The manufacturer of the device's BIOS.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.SystemProductName
member.summary: The product name of the system hardware.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.SystemManufacturer
member.summary: The manufacturer of the system hardware.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.ChassisTypeDesc
member.summary: The description of the chassis type (e.g., laptop, desktop).

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.ConnectionIp
member.summary: The current IP address used to connect to Falcon.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.ConnectionMacAddress
member.summary: The MAC address used for the current Falcon connection.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.LocalIp
member.summary: The local IP address of the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.ExternalIp
member.summary: The external (public) IP address of the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.DefaultGatewayIp
member.summary: The IP address of the device's default gateway.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.MachineDomain
member.summary: The domain to which the device belongs.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.SiteName
member.summary: The site or location name associated with the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.OrganizationalUnits
member.summary: The list of organizational units (OUs) to which the device belongs.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.Tags
member.summary: The list of tags assigned to the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.ReducedFunctionalityMode
member.summary: Indicates whether the device is operating in reduced functionality mode.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.HostHiddenStatus
member.summary: Indicates whether the host is hidden in Falcon.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.FilesystemContainmentStatus
member.summary: The status of filesystem containment on the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.RtrState
member.summary: The Real Time Response (RTR) state of the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.PointerSize
member.summary: The pointer size (architecture) of the operating system.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.MajorVersion
member.summary: The major version number of the operating system.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.MinorVersion
member.summary: The minor version number of the operating system.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.BuildNumber
member.summary: The build number of the operating system.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.DevicePolicies
member.summary: The dictionary of device policy assignments and their details.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.Policies
member.summary: The list of policy objects applied to the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.Meta
member.summary: Additional metadata associated with the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.ModifiedTimestamp
member.summary: The timestamp when the device details were last modified.

member.summary: The base configuration ID for the device.

member.summary: The build configuration ID for the device.

member.summary: The platform configuration ID for the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.CpuSignature
member.summary: The CPU signature of the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.CpuVendor
member.summary: The CPU vendor of the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.MacAddress
member.summary: The MAC address of the device.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetail.GroupHash
member.summary: The hash value representing the group membership of the device.

member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetailEnvelope
member.summary: Represents the top-level response envelope containing device detail results and any associated errors. Falcon may return partial structures or nulls depending on the query context.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetailEnvelope.Resources
member.summary: A list of detailed device records returned by the API.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceDetailEnvelope.Errors
member.summary: A list of errors encountered during the API request, if any. This is loosely structured and may contain untyped details.

member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceQueryResponse
member.summary: Describes the structure of a Falcon device query response. All fields are optional and may be null or missing depending on the API response.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceQueryResponse.Resources
member.summary: A list of device ID strings returned by the query.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceQueryResponse.Errors
member.summary: Optional error information returned by the API. Use with caution â€” structure is loosely defined.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.DeviceQueryResponse.Meta
member.summary: Metadata associated with the query response. May contain pagination or query diagnostics.

member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityDetail
member.summary: Represents detailed information about a vulnerability.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityDetail.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the vulnerability.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityDetail.Cve
member.summary: Gets or sets the CVE (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures) details associated with the vulnerability.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityDetail.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the status of the vulnerability.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityDetail.Severity
member.summary: Gets or sets the severity level of the vulnerability.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityDetail.Remediation
member.summary: Gets or sets the remediation steps for the vulnerability.

member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.CveDetail
member.summary: Represents detailed information about a CVE (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures).

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.CveDetail.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the CVE.

member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityDetailEnvelope
member.summary: Represents an envelope containing details about vulnerabilities.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityDetailEnvelope.Resources
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of vulnerability details.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityDetailEnvelope.Errors
member.summary: Gets or sets the errors associated with the vulnerability details.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityDetailEnvelope.Meta
member.summary: Gets or sets the metadata associated with the vulnerability details.

member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityQueryResponse
member.summary: Represents the response for a vulnerability query.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityQueryResponse.Resources
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of resources associated with the query.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityQueryResponse.Errors
member.summary: Gets or sets the errors associated with the query, if any.

member.name: P:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Models.VulnerabilityQueryResponse.Meta
member.summary: Gets or sets the metadata associated with the query.

member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeAuthService
member.summary: Handles authentication and token management for the CrowdStrike Falcon API.

member.name: M:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeAuthService.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Configuration.CrowdStrikeOptions})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The HTTP client instance used to make requests.
The options containing CrowdStrike credentials and endpoint base URL.

member.name: M:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeAuthService.GetAccessTokenAsync
member.summary: Retrieves a valid access token for the CrowdStrike Falcon API, reusing the cached token if not expired.
member.returns: The OAuth2 access token as a string.
member.exception: Thrown when a token cannot be retrieved from the API.

member.name: M:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeAuthService.GetOptions
member.summary: Exposes the current CrowdStrikeOptions configuration.

member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeDeviceService
member.summary: Provides methods to retrieve server device information from the CrowdStrike Falcon API.

member.name: M:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeDeviceService.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeAuthService,Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Configuration.CrowdStrikeOptions})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The HTTP client used for API requests.
The authentication service for obtaining access tokens.
The configuration options for CrowdStrike API.

member.name: M:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeDeviceService.GetAllServerDevicesAsync
member.summary: Retrieves a filtered list of server and domain controller devices from CrowdStrike Falcon.

member.name: M:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeDeviceService.GetDeviceIdsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves device IDs (AIDs) that match a given hostname.

member.name: M:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeDeviceService.GetDeviceDetailsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves detailed device information for a given device ID (AID).

member.name: T:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeSpotlightService
member.summary: Provides methods to interact with CrowdStrike Spotlight API for retrieving vulnerability data.

member.name: M:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeSpotlightService.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeAuthService,Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Configuration.CrowdStrikeOptions})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The HTTP client used for API requests.
The authentication service for obtaining access tokens.
The configuration options for CrowdStrike API.

member.name: M:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeSpotlightService.GetVulnerabilityIdsForHostAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of vulnerability IDs for a specific host.
member.param: The host ID (AID) to query vulnerabilities for.

member.name: M:ZentrixLabs.FalconSdk.Services.CrowdStrikeSpotlightService.GetVulnerabilityDetailsAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves detailed information about vulnerabilities based on their IDs.
member.param: The host ID (AID) to query vulnerabilities for.
A list of vulnerability IDs to retrieve details for.
Indicates whether to use host-specific vulnerability IDs prefixed with the host ID (AID).
An optional filter string for querying vulnerabilities.
Indicates whether to include facets like remediation or evaluation logic in the query.
member.returns: A list of objects containing detailed information about the vulnerabilities.
member.exception: Thrown when the API request fails.
